name: Impulse: Space Combat
description: Impulse: Space Combat is a first person, realistic, action game. In Impulse, physics play a major role in determining which team will be left standing. All movement and interaction is controlled using physics. When your ship is hit with a projectile you will feel the impact!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: This game is very easy to run on even the weakest computers. It was originally built on a laptop so performance is of top priority.
